sprite.id: Up and down and all around

case.state: Wait, what is this, PS1 physics? What am I hanging from right now?
Try not to think too hard about what I'm hanging from, 'kay? Just roll with it.
Did I ever mention that I'm a world class mime? I'm actually hanging from an invisible box right now. Wait, mimes aren't supposed to talk. Oops.
Hey, what's up? Huh? Strip poker, that's what's up?
Huh. A strip poker joint. Definitely not what I was expecting.
Hi. A friend told me that there's a swingers club here? Oh, wait, strip poker? Err...sure, I guess I can work with that. (Dammit, MJ!)
Yo-yo! Mind if I drop in?
Hi. I've heard this is where all the cool people hang out.
Hello there! Mind if I hang here for a bit? Sorry, couldn't resist.
Welcome, true believers and newcomers alike!
Hello! Does this place serve human yo-yos?
Yeah, honestly, I'm not happy about it either, Miki. I'm keepin' a close eye on them. Nothing bad's going to happen on my watch.
Dayum, girlfriend, I like your style! It is a critical hit and no mistaking it.
Now that is a punky look if ever I saw one! Critical Daring? Wait, Darling, right? I certainly like the stage name as well as the style.
Paris? J'adore Paris!
I don't think the moon in the sky is the only moon we're gonna see tonight.
*sigh* Well when in Rome...or Paris in this case.
Do you think people can see us from up here? (Hopefully not. I don't want to lose both my identity and my dignity)
Do they speak French in the Paris in this universe? If so, I really wish I paid attention in French class.
*sigh* I can't believe I'm in Paris and I'm doing this of all things...
Strip poker in Paris... Can't say I've ever had that in my travel plans.
You'd think an extra-dimensional travel agency would mention strip poker in the brochure.
(The hot spring looks rather inviting. Depending how this game goes I may have to hop in)
A steamy environment for a steamy game. How fitting...
Look at all the hearts everywhere! And we're playing a card game. There's a joke to be made here...
Given it's close to Valentine's Day, seems fitting we have this here.
Believe it or not, a universe where there's a bajillion hearts everywhere isn't the craziest universe I've gone to.
Wow, look at all these ladies and gentlemen. This is a weird crossover world, but hey, let's have some fun.
So are you all from different universes too? Or is this a Comic Con after hours sort of deal? Whatever the reason, I'm so not losing!
*sigh* Well when in Rome...
I'm sooo gonna regret this. (And I'm sooo gonna get back at MJ for lying to me about this place).
Alright, sure. I'll stay and play. What's the worst that could happen? (A lot of things, I'm sure).
Well, a-alright. I guess I was planning on doing something like this eventually.
Well, I'm sure that Spider-Woman can handle a game of cards.
(Hmm. I'm sure that the old Spider-Sense will come in handy. That's not cheating, right?)
Well... okay then! This isn't my home universe, so why not?
Screw it. I'll swap everything.
Five. And yes, I need them.
Ugh. Got nothing. Five new cards please, dealer.
None for me thanks. Don't need 'em.
Nah, I'm not switching any this time.
Nope! Don't need to switch anything. Thanks anyway though.
Psh! Why would I swap out any of these?
What?! WHAT!? No way!
You're kidding!
~cards~ for me, dealer.
Alright then, ~cards~ please.
Hmm...~cards~ would be the obvious move...
~cards~ should be what I need.
Let's go with ~cards~. Thanks.
Okay, ~cards~ is good a decision as any.
I'll snag ~cards~.
So, you know Earth-~cards~, right? That's the number I want.
~cards~.
~cards~ please.
~cards~ thanks.
Okay, so if I take away...~cards~ thank you.
Ditch those and, yeah, ~cards~ for me.
~cards~.
Lemme just snag ~cards~.
I'm thinking ~cards~.
Let's make it ~cards~.
I spy-der ~cards~ I don't need over here.
~cards~.
A smart spider would go for ~cards~. So, I'll do that!
~cards~.
Yeesh. Gonna need ~cards~ to fix this.
How about ~cards~?
~cards~ me, Amadeus!
Yeesh. Gonna need ~cards~ to fix this.
Gwanda need ~cards~ cards over here, haha! (Oh, wait, that one doesn't work...)
Gwen are my cards arriving?
~cards~.
Hopefully ~cards~ will do the trick.
Hmm...I'm hoping ~cards~ should do the trick.
~cards~, peas and carrots.
~cards~, please and thank you.
Umm...alright, ~cards~.
~cards~
Okay, I can do this with ~cards~, I hope.
(~cards~ will be enough, right?) Yes, ~cards~ please.
I'll take ~cards~.
Wanna guess? Ha, kidding. ~cards~ please.
Yeah, gonna go with ~cards~ this round.
The smart thing to do...would be to go for ~cards~.
Yikes. ~cards~.
~cards~, now! Err, please, sorry.
I need ~cards~, r-right now!
~cards~, I need ~cards~ over this way.
Err...hmm...okay, ~cards~.
~cards~.
~cards~!
~cards~...hope this works...
5...no wait, ~cards~! (Please don't let me down, Spider-Sense...)
I don't think I need any...nowait! Idefinitelyneed ~cards~!
A Spider-Woman in need needs ~cards~ this round.
Umm...err...okay, I'll go with ~cards~.
I...I...need ~cards~?
I think I need ~cards~...yeah okay, ~cards~.
~cards~.
...A tentative ~cards~?
~cards~. Come on, don't let me down...
Hmm...see if I can dodge this here bullet.
I have a fondness for other bug heroes with a smidgen of nervousness. Y'know. Like some people here.
This's a good hand...and yeah, sorta? Sam's a lot more... forward than you are. Years of fighting in Nazi controlled time-lines do that, I suppose.
Hey, Ladybug, you ever visit NYC?
Yo, LB, ever visit NYC? It's nice when it's not being threatened by villains. And when it is, well, it'd benefit from a visit by you I'm sure.
Hey, LB, you ever visit NYC?
Yo, LB, ever visit NYC? It's nice when it's not being threatened by villains. And when it is, well, it'd benefit from a visit by you I'm sure.
Okay, okay. I'll wait for you to lose for real, Mari.
Morrigan! Control your bats! (Least she's not as bad as Morbius. Or Koala Kommander!)
Whoa, this's a crazy alternate dimension. My Cap's a woman!
Ugh this is gonna sound sooo cliche. But obviously I'm a fan of old-school rap and punk rock. Aaand anything with some good drumming it, I can definitely enjoy that.
I’m certainly not opposed to you speaking to me in French, ~Marinette~. (I could listen to her read the dictionary! The French one at least).
Okay, gotta say, I really love it whenever you're speaking French. (Wonder if me and the MJ's could get her to record some lines!)
I'm not always the most...forward person in relationships. It's hard, y'know? When you do what I do, you often don't want to get too close to people.
This will sound so cliche but…I like hot dogs from the Dollar Dog. Nothin’ needs to be fancy for it to be good!
I’m not too picky. Would prefer to order something after the game, though. Put it on me if I lose! (Oh, shoot. I'm not carrying money. Hmm...shouldn't be hard to beat someone who's drunk, right?)
I’m not too picky. Just serve me something with a pickleback, I guess? That's a fun way to start a party.
So Sei's into butt stuff? Well… I’ve...huh, well, good to know I guess?
Woah, hol' up. That might be tmi right there. That or I'm not drunk enough to talk about that kinda thing yet.
I'm not actually that unique… the other Gwens aren't me by a long shot, though. Or the usual Gwen Stacys. But I am my own person. I can always say that.
Huh, sure, April, I could do an interview. Usually I don't get a chance to say my side.
Do you know what would go great with this hand? Some wine. I'm thinking a nice Bordeaux...
Do you know what would go great with this hand? Some cheese. I'm thinking a nice brie with a toasted baguette...
Do you know what would go great with this hand? Some crêpes. I like mine with strawberries...
Hot damn I can't believe it! Ha! Just wait until you see this hand!
Oh my God! This is like one in a million right here!
Wow...am I in a universe where this is more common, or have I actually just gotten this lucky?
It's over, ~player~! I have the high ground! Er - I mean a great hand.
Sooo is this what's done in this universe for fun? Or are we all just doing some sorta ancient ritual?
This hand has a better lineup than the Mets! (Even gives my fantasy baseball team a run for its money.)
You know what? I gotta good feeling about this round.
Getting no bad vibes from this hand.
Sweet! Exactly what I wanted.
Hmm...normally my luck isn't this good. Not complaining mind you.
I'm feeling some good vibrations. Beach Boys, anyone?
Alright, gotta keep these good hands like the good times rolling!
(Hmm. I've definitely had worse than these).
This doesn't seem right. Most of the Gwen Stacys aren't known for being this lucky...
YES! I mean OH NO! $%@&! (Nice save, Gwen)
(I'll certainly take this hand).
What? Are you so desperate a pretty face is all you need to lose your nerve, ~player~?
You know, some of you suggested making really good hands worth two. How about now?
I'm no formal detective, but something tells me I'm winning this hand.
Shame I couldn't have gotten more hands like this before I lost my mask.
Ooh! This hand's pretty fire.
Are you feeling confident? Because I sure am.
(Good! Should be avoiding another loss with this one).
(Yes! A hand I can be confident in).
(This is a hand I can hold with confidence).
(Looks like I'm not gonna lose anything this round).
Well well well. Guess who's not stripping this time?
(Damn, didn't get what I...no, wait. These are better!)
Sooo, yeah. looks like I'm not the only blonde here tonight. Let's see what they say if we have more fun or what, 'kay?
Let's both of us try to buck that old, bs stereotype.
Heh, we got a bluenette here tonight, eh? What a weird word.
The word for blue-haired people is bluenettes, you know that, right?
(Whoa. I'd say I've never seen hair like whatername's over there, but between villains and punk-rockers, I've seen some pretty crazy hair. Still impressive though).
Whoa, gonna comment on the exotic hairdos hair tonight. Get it? Hair today, gone tomorrow? Yeah, yeah...eeeh that one kinda blew, sorry.
(I've got to admit, I think MJ would be a total riot in a game like this! And she'd totally take it all in her stride, being fearless as she is).
(Can't help but being reminded of MJ, seeing another red-head. But it'd be dumb to assume anything about their personality for it. It sucks being generalized like that).
Gotta admit, and whilst this isn't your fault, ~player~, green isn't exactly my favorite color. I've...I've got my reasons.
(I'm so bad for thinking this, but I wonder if the carpet matches the drapes? The thought of a green "bush" is just plain funny).
(I wonder if they're actually blonde and took a swim in the pool before coming here...)
Pink hair? Well, you've got me tickled. *Badum-tss*
Pink hair? Definitely seen my share of that. Hey, you'd be surprised how many punk rock types wear pink, even in their hair. Pink is, like, a double level of rebellion in the scene!
Hey, Deep Purple, how're your cards? Heh, I wonder how many people even know about that band these days.
Ain't there a song about purple-haired whatshername? Maybe? Eh, there's lots of songs that bring up the color purple at some point.
Eyy, purple! A classic color in the punk and glam rock scenes! What's not to love about it?
Ooh, gotta love the ghostly white hair. Funny, I'm actually known as the Ghost-Spider some places 'cause of my costume.
(Gotta say, I always liked Felicia's white hair. I can say what I like but that cat has some style!)
What, I'm a fan of the color white? What on Earth gave that away?!
(With a hand like this, I'm still in with a chance!)
This works. It doesn't work cleanly, but this fight's been anything if not dirty.
(Good save, Spider-Sense! Good save!)
*Phew* I can relax for one round at least. Hopefully!
(I should be able to evade danger this round).
There's a gallows-style joke that I'm dead in every universe except the one I'm currently in. Point is: I'm still in this game! (That's still so damn weird to me).
Woo! Good hand! Alright!
Looks like my instincts were right on the money this round. (Might just have been my Spider-Sense though. No rules about that in poker).
(Good! Just what I needed right now).
I tend to have a soft spot for other bug heroes with a smidgen of nervousness. Y'know. You kinda remind me of me. In a lot of ways, actually.
This's a good hand... and yeah, sorta! Sam's a lot more... forward. Years of fighting in Nazi dimensions'll do that, I suppose.
Haha! Wow! Those are some flaming hot undies, D.Va. Very pin-up.
Miraculous Ladybug? Like, Amazing Spider-Woman? Hmm...what if I call you MLB? Yeah, MLB. That sounds cool whenever it's said out loud.
The Miraculous Ladybug is quite a mouthful, huh? Say, what if I call you by a nickname? I'm Spidey. You could be...MLB? (Huh. That actually sounds pretty cool).
Okay, okay. I'll wait for you to lose for real, Mari.
(Whoa, this's a crazy alternate dimension. My Cap's a woman!)
Wait, huh? Oh. Captain America's a dude in this universe. (More of a MAN than a dude, though. Dude doesn't seem like it fits right).
I'm really sorry! Didn't mean any offense by the blonde chicks and bodysuits comment. You look lovely too, D.Va.
Err, sorry. No offense about the blonde chicks and bodysuits, you look lovely too, Marinette.
Sorry, sorry! No offense about that dumb blonde chicks and bodysuits thing! You look lovely too, Meia.
You’re fine by me, Futaba. So long as you're not just doing things for the thrill of it. (Stunts like that can have real big consequences).
So long as you're not just hacking and other stuff like that because you can. I've known people like that, it doesn't ever go well in the long run.
I doubt this is much of a surprise, but I'm a real fan of old-school rap and rock. Lotta those OG guys were from the Bronx, so that stuff speaks to me.
You know, it’s a bit weird to be idolized...like, real weird. But hey, at the same time, I appreciate it! It's nice to have supporters.
Man, Seven and Futaba, do you two not get out much or what? If this is your idea of that? Well, that's super brave of you!
Oh yeah, the MLB is also about baseball. But you’re the one hitting it out of the park, Lady B!
“Heronet?” That’s a thing? Where do I sign up?
Aww, don't do me like that. I’m a modern, American hero too, you know!
I...I don’t know if I’m that adventurous. But I’m sure I could show you a Miraculous time! (Wait, was that too cringey?)
Oh uh, of course I meant Marinette!
Meia and Mei. A Mei of Meias! Oh, s-sorry, your names are fun to say is all!
Meia? Mia? Mee-uh? M-eye-uh? Names are hard, folks.
Remind me how you guys pronounce your names exactly, again?
Hey, so if I pronounce one of you guy's names wrong at some point, sorry in advance.
It's, uh...complicated. Like, I don't want to be a loner, but, doing what I do? Knowing how that can go for people who trust me? Makes it real hard to do friends. Or relationships.
This will sound so cliche but…I like hot dogs from the Dollar Dog. Nothin’ fancy and not tryin’ to be.
Oh! Well, thanks! I’m not too picky. So long as it isn't Ouzo then I should be good!
I’m not too picky. Oh, so long as it goes with a side of lime I should be alright.
Whoa, Seven, what's the stuff around your eye? Is it jewelry? Something high tech?
*Pffft!* Front page smears. Okay, that was a good one.
So Sei's into butt stuff? Well… I’ve never met a guy who wasn’t happy I was okay with it, even if I’m not enthusiastic about it.
I'm not actually that unique… the other Gwens aren't me by a long shot, though. Or the usual Gwen Stacys.
Whoa, I like the accent. You from Brooklyn, Aimee? I’m a Queens girl, myself.
You look like a girl who knows her way around a pie. A pizza pie, at least, April.
Ladybug? Whaaat? I knew Paris had some superheroes, but I never expected one here. Let’s totally team up, and kick some butt! Either side of the pond would do.
Seven, you seem a bit...you okay? (She sounds kinda monotone. Hope she's feeling alright. Or...that she isn't a Skrull in disguise or something like that).
Hey, Seven. I could never rock a cut like that, Orrr at least I didn't think that. Kind of an accident but my style's actually kinda similar to yours.
Whew! (Seven's suit sure does show off! I mean, dayum! That's a tight uniform! That makes my costume look easy to wear).
Jeez. I'm just staring at that uniform. That thing must damn near strangle the life out of you.
Am I the only one more comfortable in her suit than out of it? Like, seriously, it's like getting a day-long hug.
Personally speaking I find costumes like mine real comfortable. I wouldn't do street patrols in this if I didn't feel comfortable!
What's it with blonde chicks and bodysuits?
Trust me, ladies and gentlemen, you're not gonna be all that interested with what I'm working with. I'm just normal looking...
I'll hit! Wait, wrong game. Sorry folks!
Not bad, not bad.
I've done more with less.
Drum roll please...!
Let's see who's next!
Not gonna lie, this one's kinda shrug-worthy.
Any particular reason why we aren't using chairs? Or tables? Pretty weird setup for a card game. Feels like playing a drum kit without a stool.
This hand's like a 4/4 beat in a song. It's alright, but kinda basic.
Can we order food or drinks or something? I'd really like a corn dog right now.
So we don't bet in this game? Just see who has the worst cards? Got it.
I wonder if anyone got bit by the spider in this universe or if it's one of those weird ones where we're just comicbook characters.
Cool.
Hmm...oh, okay.
I can work with this.
Should I bluff? Not sure if I need to bluff.
Argh! This uncertainty is killing me.
Putting my hopes on these.
Aww, man. I wish I'd brought a band T-shirt or two along. Would've been happy to hand some out.
(Crap. I was thinking about something else. This hand's...commensurate with that).
Meh.
There's no like, draft passing, right?
(This hand's of...ambiguous quality).
Ugh. (Not garbage, but not great either).
(I might be the Amazing Spider-Woman, but this is decidedly not an amazing hand).
This is...eh, it's okay by me.
Blah. (This hand's blah with a side of blah supreme).
(Hmm...not so good that I could avoid losing with this. And knowing a Spider's luck...)
Hmm...yeah, 's alright.
Anyone want to trade cards? Is that a rule in this universe? Please tell me that's a rule.
I kinda wanted to play this back when I was younger. Wow, I would've been sooo grounded if my folks found out I'd been playing strip poker. Even with friends, much less strangers.
(Y'know, there's a weird, never-made-it-to-a-frat-party side of me that's a little excited standing here like this).
Really cutting it close here!
Oh come on! Cut a part-time bodega clerk a break!
Folks, the girls are out. Any chance you'll... No? Ugh, fine.
I need some more cards! Wait, that's it? I don't know mulligan now, do I? No?
(Oof. If that was as good as my Spider-Sense could do, I'd hate to have seen my hand without it).
(I'm looking for better than this...)
...Well, could still be worse.
(Man, really? That's all I've got?)
(This mediocre hand goes out to all the dudes who play acoustic guitars at parties).
Sheesh. Mediocre hand.
I tend to have a thing for other bug heroes with a smidgen of nervousness. Heh, no way that sounds familiar, right?
(I wonder if anyone else is getting the willies right now... Odd vibes, from that girl over there. Odd vibes.)
This's a good hand... and yeah, sorta! Sam's a lot more... forward. Years of fighting in Nazi dimensions'll do that, I suppose.
Okay, okay. I'll wait for you to lose for real, Mari.
Whoa, this's kinda crazy. My Cap's a woman! (I'm familiar with my alt universe Spider-people. But not my alt universe Captain Americas).
Ugh this is gonna sound so cliche. But obviously I'm a fan of old-school rap and punk rock. (%$#@ the establishment! But not really).
I'd, uhh, that kinda stuff's a bit too personal to talk about. Can we not, please?
I like hot dogs from the Dollar Dog...hey, don't look at me like that, street food stuff is awesome!
I’m not too picky. Oh, just serve it with a pickle back, though. Uh, after I lose my mask. Which I'm aiming not to.
I’m not too picky. Oh, just serve it with a pickle back, though.
So Sei's into butt stuff? Well… I’ve never met a guy who wasn’t happy I was okay with it, even if I’m not enthusiastic about it.
I'm not actually that unique… the other Gwens aren't me by a long shot, though.
*sigh* Well, at least there's this view.
Hmm. At least the city's lovely right now.
Ah... what a trash-fire of a hand. And believe me, I know my trash-fires.
My Spider-Sense is tingling...and not in a good way. (Not like there ever was a good way).
Oh. That's not good.
A hit and a miss. That's this hand.
Well, this hand sucks.
(Oh, I've got a bad hand. Just my luck).
Aww, not what I wanted.
Whoops. That was a mistake.
Darn it.
YES! Wait. No. Never mind. #$@%
Darn. Never mind.
(Oops.)
So, how are we all doing? We all get here safely enough?
Huh. Really? Now?
Look guys, I already showed you my face. That's already worth a lot, don't you think?
(Aww crap. Really?)
*sigh* that's gonna put some dirt in my eye.
Ouch. Feels like someone cut my web-line mid swing.
YEEEAAAhhhhaaaaa...ah...I've made a mistake.
Great, cards that're like a rock group without drums.
Oof. This hand's one drum short of a kit.
Hm, I was going to web a few more cards, but I guess I'll stick with this. No? Not funny?
(Darn it. Not what I wanted).
(Well damn. Only thing that's getting schooled right now is me).
Would be a bummer if something decided to crash into here and interrupt the game. Yep. A reeaaal bummer...
(You're trash, cards).
Just to be clear, there's no house rules that make 2's wild, right?
(What's the weather gonna be like when I get back home? Can I even find that out when I'm here?)
(Damn! I was really hoping the Mets would pull through this game. Hopefully I do a little better.)
Sun's out, guns out...uhh. Well, not really. (And I've not got a great hand neither).
My Spider-Sense doesn't seem super reliable here...
Tell you what. You let me win this hand, I'll take one for you later. I still need to psych myself up.
No...
*sigh* (And here's one Gwen Stacy who thought she was gonna make it...)
(Oh come on, Spider-Sense! You're supposed to do better than this!)
(Welp! I'm in need of a rescue here).
My damsel in distress level is rising by the second.
(Bullet not dodged! Bullet not dodged!)
Well, this makes me want to jump off of the Brooklyn Bridge. Well, almost.
(Face it, tiger. This is all you've got).
Crap.
Nope. I don't see no tan-lines, Nami. Just a whole lotta pirate booty... did I say that out loud?
(No, Gwen! That joke's so obvious and in your face. Just like Nami's behind is in my face right now.)

Hey, I won't laugh. Dancing is hard. Oh, you'd think that being able to quadruple somersault over machinegun fire would make me a good dancer? Nope! I can mess up the most basic moves. 'S why I keep to the drums whenever I perform.
Oh my gosh, Meia! Happy Birthday! I-I mean I won't make too much of a deal out of it if you don't want that. But, still, I hope today goes well for ya!
Wha? Birthday? Your birthday? Oh sweet, many happy returns, Meia! I'll be sure to see if I can snag you a nice, special something to remember planet Earth by.
Oh my God! Congratulations, Miki! Can't deny, this is an unconventional way to celebrate, but still, Happy Birthday, babe!
Okay, I'm ninety nine percent sure that you're just venting, babe. But there will be no murderings nor muggings on my watch, thank you very much.
...I hope you're just exaggerating, girlfriend. 'Cause otherwise you sound like a bit of a road menace. Take it from a fellow "menace".
...So long as no one got hurt... still, please be careful out there, babe. Pinkie promise? Good road safety is no laughing matter.
(That's gotta be the best behind I've ever seen!)
Holy moly, guacamole. (I know it's rude to stare, but dayum!)
(I think my whole apartment's smaller than her bottom is).
(She could put someone under arrest with that thing. Cardiac arrest at the very least).
Astounding...hand! G-got an astounding hand over here. My cards definitely aren't, err, ass. T-that's for sure.
(That's the People's Republic of China's ass right there).
(Boy. If ever there was a contender for the national ass of China, it'd be Chun-Li's).

Oh, I could talk about plenty! I'm real passionate about music, I mean, I'm in a band, it wouldn't be much good if I wasn't passionate. But I also have other interests, new tech and science news for instance.
Joey, I gotta say, been thinking about your whole uh, state of affairs downstairs. The shaved look’s gotta be so it’s easy to put whip cream or other Burlesque gags, right?

Hey, careful with that sorta bet, Emi. I might not be known for my sprinting, but that's only because I'm faster on a web-line. Still, you're pretty awesome. Maybe you would give me a run for my money.
O-oh. Umm... awkward question. See... how do I put this? Meia, I'm normally the one trying to stop piracy in my neighborhood, amongst other things.
Meia, with the utmost respect, no. That's not an offer that a crime-fighting gal like me can accept. Got nothing against you on a personal level, but no. Sorry.
No, no. You've got a point. Metal is just that damn awesome.
Yeah, metal really captures the human experience. All that passion and emotion, it's got it all and I love it!

Ohh! Emm! Gee! I spent like half an hour petting the little thing! Oh, by the way, I webbed a little safety lead on him, to stop him getting lost. Sorry, I would've mentioned it earlier, just didn't know he was yours.

Shut up! That cute lil' piglet I saw earlier is yours!? He's the cutest little dude I've seen all week! He should be perfectly safe. I made sure he had a little lead on him before I left, hope that's not an issue.
Is that the fake kind or the real kind of fortune-telling that you're talking about? Trust me, there is a difference, and the real kind is... pretty darn freaky, I can't lie.
Ah, good ol' fortune-telling. Never fails to freak me the F out, if you pardon my French, sorry. 'Cause not all of it is fake, believe me. Most of it is fake. Just not... all of it.
*Psh* Nah, girl! Fun as that idea sounds, wrestling's not my style. But, now that you mention it, I do know a spider-themed person or two who decided that was a good idea.
I think you're thinking of some other guy. A... fair few other guys, actually. Funny story, actually... Wanna hear about it, CD?
Man, having prehensile webs seems a lot more useful. But where’d you summon all those vines from?
Hey, random question, but do you know Batman?
I love this song!
You know, I'm quite the drummer. Maybe we could have a little jam session after this.
I'm in a band called the Mary Janes. You should hear some of our music, Amy. It's a similar style.
Oh $#!^, that reminds me. I'm gonna miss band practice again...
I wish this place had a drum kit. We could get someone on guitar and find a bassist to have ourselves a little cover band.
Yeah. They know. It honestly makes things easier in some ways. Back when they didn't know? I'd disappear off, miss practice sessions, even missed a gig or two. It gave me a flakey reputation.
Yeah. My band-mates know. Sometimes I wish they didn't, y'know? Them knowing who I am, it puts them in danger by association. But they've stuck by me all the same and I love them for that.

Hmm... y'know, I actually have heard Spider-people use a simillar system. Only, we use our rogue's gallery instead of mythological figures. Like, say, "Oh, it's Rhino bad today. But at least it's not Goblin bad."
Oh, shoot, haha! Now I get you. I can see how that "scale" could get confusing fast. But I'm guessing that's what makes it fun!
Oh, jeez, you wouldn't find me doing that part! Decent drummer I might be, but a decent singer I am not, haha. But yeah, it's great when the gals can all do different parts.
Oh well, hey, that's no issue. Drumming's a bit like a martial art. The basics keep the performance going, and it's the fancy parts that win you the style points!
Yeah, that's the one, babe! And it's as crazy as it sounds! Even with my spider powers I can't hit the fastest tempos. I'd seriously need an extra pair of arms or something.
Ooh, yeah! Well, stand me corrected, haha. Still, can't deny how epic it was all the same. Love those guys.
Oh. S-sorry, don't go thinking that I was trying to diss you. In fact, rising to the occasion like that is exactly what I'm talking about! Doing what's right when it really matters.
Man, you know how to brighten up the situation!
Always looking on the bright side of things, aren't you Lux?
Be careful. If you lose, we may see a flash!
What's that? A little glimmer in your eye? Okay, it's a bit of an off-day for me in the pun department.
Well aren't you making light of the situation.
Oh so you're a pun-master too? I've been told I'm sick with the burns and bad with the puns, but that doesn't stop me!
Okay that one was bad even for my standards.
There's nothing wrong with a little light banter!
Blinded by the light! Revved up like a deuce, another runner in the night!
Not gonna lie, I wouldn't mind being flashed.
You've just brightened my day!

I mean...I've taken more big hits than I can count, but thanks to my powers I can shrug off harm better than most. Never had an injury that's left a scar on me so far. And boy have I had some serious ones.

I've, uhh, never had to worry about it, I'm afraid to say. I heal a lot better than most, thanks to the way I am. But if you want me to talk about all the dangerous situations I've been in then I can talk for hours.
You'd expect me to be covered in scars after everything I've been through. But I've not picked up any permanent marks so far in my career. I can thank advanced healing for that.
(Dammit. I know my knife-markings. This...this isn't something someone's done to her. Ayano's made those marks herself).
(Should I say something? I know those knife-marks are self-inflicted. I should...I should talk to her privately after the game, see if I can help).
(Okay. Okay, Ayano's been cutting herself. A lot of her behavior makes more sense now. Poor girl, she needs help. I see what I can do for her after this is over).
Good for you, Mercy! I know it's hard to not get competitive. Or, just to get worked up over the whole stripping deal.
Yeah, good to keep in mind that this is supposed to be a game and supposed to be fun.
Hey, no problem, Angela. But no need to apologize, we're all friends here, after all.
I don't live here, sweetie. I'm from New York city. That's where you'll find my resident neighborhood.
Nope! Just visiting. I'm not from around here, I'm from New York.
No, sorry. I'm representing my home town of New York, May.
Wha? I don't wear a mask to cause trouble. Honest. I actively do my best to put an end to trouble.
N-no! Honest. I'm, like, anti-trouble, Mia. I wear a mask to fight crime and help people in whichever ways I can.
Aww. Luffy sounds like a sweet guy. Also, heh, sounds like you've got a bit of a sweet spot for him. Am I right or am I right?
Wait. How does he use three swords at once? Oh, wait! I'm a dumbass. Obviously not all at once.
Hmm...only Usopp I've heard of is the Greek dude who told all those fables. Oh, wait. That was Aesop. My bad.
Huh. A perverted chef. Weird. Well, I guess that whatever he gets up to with any rudely-shaped vegetables is his own business.
Huh. That's odd. Normally it's the other way around, a dude turning into an animal of some sort. Although, I do know one guy a bit like that. And lemme tell ya, he's a total character.
Hey, no jokes this time. Friends like your Robin are special. Being able to rely on someone like that? Yeah, that's super special.
Man, a ship's architect, that's so cool! Also, hey, don't knock the craft. It often takes a few failed inventions to reach a good one.

Hold the F up! A skeleton pirate who plays music? Are you serious!? Oh I need to meet this dude! It's criminal that I haven't heard about this until now! God, can I meet them? Can we write a song together? (Oh I have to tell the girls about this guy. MJ would scream! Would he agree to do a live performance with us? I wonder what kinda music he makes? A rock/sea shanty fusion could be pretty darn sweet. Oh my God this is so awesome...)
Yes, girlfriend! I'm all about promoting body confidence! And, umm, I guess my legs. Yeah. They look good and they've gotten me out of some very dangerous situations.
I'm glad to hear it, and I agree! Everyone aught to feel good in their own skin. And...hmm...well, I'd pick my legs, I guess? I wouldn't have gotten far in life without 'em.

Hmm. Interesting question. I can't really tell you about the world in general, but I can tell you which neighborhoods you aught to avoid in New York, "Hell's Kitchen" being the first that comes to mind.
Umm. Well, New York's a beautiful city, but it has it's danger spots. Harlem can be rough, depending on which street you're on. It's a bit unfair to single out specific areas though.

(I've got more regrets than dreams...oh come on, Gwen. Don't be all emo.) Well, I'm part of a band, might have mentioned it already. We're pretty unknown, but, it'd be great fun to play one of the larger venues, or a stadium.

I have some dreams, more like fantasies, that just can't ever come true. But, I can focus on other things. Making my city safer, making sure good people don't have to worry about bad people doing bad things. That's a long-term, but achievable dream right there.
Oh wow, really? Wow, you've certainly dedicated yourself to your music! That's talent right there. Oh, and I play drums, at least. Maybe we should have a drum-off some time?
Oh $#!?, for real!? Dayum, girl, you're putting me to shame! I've got some mad drum skills at least, that much I can say. It'd be fun to see who's better between us, schedule a drum-off, maybe?
Ooh, hey, I'd love to! Me and the MJ's were set to perform a month from now. I'm sure we'd knock the socks off of the audience if we combined forces.
Now that's an idea I could get behind. Your band and mine? We'd be like a damn Megazord, coming together and combining our powers, haha.

That's a pretty sick combo, putting purple and green together (even if it does remind me of a few folks). Umm, well, as for my colors, I think those are pretty obvious, haha. I do dig a few others though.
A pretty provocative combination right there, CD. I like! Hmm, as for what other color combos I like? Well...

Yeah. Umm. Yeah, avoid anything to do with devils or souls, that's my advice. Anything to do with pacts, bargains, just... noooo. If ever I have to face Satan, I'm calling Jack Black to fight on my behalf.

You're asking me whether bargaining souls with Satan is a good idea?! Just... leave the devil-duelling to Tenacious D, honey. I sure as hell know that Spider-folk should keep a healthy distance between themselves and demons.
Huh, as if you weren't already cool enough, CD. I mean, when it comes to me, "does whatever a spider can" is right there in the song. I've been around the multiverse, you bet I've heard that tune.

Hey, I mean, flight is cool. Heck, I've got the next best thing. That's due to my web-shooters though. Power-wise what I've got is heightened strength, agilty, reflexes, senses and a little bit of precog and healing factor for good measure.

I... *sigh* okay. Girl, I like you, I like your style and I like your energy. But, that being said, I don't dig the idea of having the ability to help people and not doing so. I wouldn't be able to live with myself if I didn't do what I do.

I have to be honest, CD. I understand what you're saying, and my powers haven't stopped me from persuing my musical dreams either. But I wouldn't be able to look myself in the mirror if I didn't use my abilities to stop bad things from happening to good people.

Hol' up! You mean that super insane one from Guitar Hero? Shieeeeet, girl, that's next level! I can't even do Cliffs of Dover on that game, let alone play it real. And I thought doing the "Faster of Puppets" challenge on drums made me sick.

Woah. Well, I certainly have to respect a sick guitarist. In real life, I'm more the "mess up Smoke on the Water" kind of girl when it comes to the axe. However, I can play the "Faster of Puppets" challenge on drums, hehe.
I... can't deny, that's a question I've thought a lot about myself, Miki. And... Fight for what matters to you. And even if that doesn't work out, what better way to live is there other than trying?

I... believe in making life count for something. That even if we fall short, we have to be hopeful. That's the best way we can live. Always try, never stop trying. That's what I think it means to be good.
What? H-hey now, Spider-Woman doesn't have time to date. But I have good reasons. It's dangerous for anyone who gets tangled up in my web, so to speak.
I...have, but, listen. It's a bit of a sore subject. I live a dangerous life, fighting dangerous people. And anyone who I get close to? I'm putting them in danger as well.
I... umm... I mean, how exactly would you date a woman? Have fun, be respectful of boundaries, just treat each-other like human beings, Meia.
I.. .don't see how it'd be too different to dating woman? Men have their differences, Meia, but they're still people. Treat them with the same respect and love you would a lady.
This might surprise people, but Heris isn't actually cleared for lab-work right now. Trust me, I know someone who tried wearing just a lab-coat to work. It wasn't me.
Oh. Well, I don't mean to sound like I'm bragging, but my own are pretty great. If I was to have one more though, I think flying would be sweet!

I mean, I have quite a few already so it's hard to think of what else I'd have. But I'd love to be super smart. I mean, I do my best and keep learning new skills, but imagine how cool being a super genius would be
Hmm...I wouldn't mind the power to turn invisible. I have a friend who can do that. That trick comes in real useful sometimes.
I...umm...God, I'm so sorry to hear that, Mia. I...know how it feels to lose family. (Though, being walked out on is very different to what happened to Dad).
Sorry that you and your sister had to deal with that, Mia.
I...huh? Well, I guess the best kind of mercs are the ones that haven't been hired to shoot me dead. I've certainly met enough of those.
Hmm...mercs who are great...I'm a big fan of the ones who haven't tried to shoot me. Ahh...I have a lotta not-so-fond experiences of private military types.
Heh. Funny question. Maybe in another life I would've been a merc myself. Crazy thought, right?
Oh! You could go with the, uuh...hmm. Hol' up. Leonie the cool kinda....s-sorry, names can be hard.
Hah. Sorry, Leonie. You're asking the wrong Spider-Woman. I'm...not exactly all that original when it comes to names.
Oh! (How should I answer that?) Umm, New York is probably "quaint" to your eye, but maybe quaint has an appeal all of it's own? The food and music are also pretty good.
There's all sorts. Even just where I'm from. New York has some of the best food and music around. And all the old buildings have a real charm to them.
Yo. I recognize that costume. Yeah! You're one of the Wasps. J-Janet, err, v-von Doom? Sorry, I know that's not right, haha. But still, nice to meet you.

Y'know... I was gonna say that it sounds generic. But coming from someone who goes by "Spider-Woman", well, that's just the pot calling the kettle black, ain't it? If you're the first Amazing Cat Lady in your area, then go with that, Nami.

Umm... 's alright. You could try to make it sound more mysterious, maybe? I sometimes go by the Ghost-Spider when I do superhero stuff. But I'm still known as Spider-Woman most places. Sometimes it's the simple names that stick.
Why, hello. Where are you from, blue-haired and gorgeous? (Oh jeez, why on Earth did I open with a line like that?)
Well, I mean, no matter how I've felt about someone, I've always tried to keep people at a distance. My line of work doesn't make it safe for people to get close.
*sigh* Yeah. I know how it feels. And that's why I've got to keep a distance from people. Having a boyfriend isn't the best idea.
Yeah. Loved. Lost. The whole nine yards, once or twice. But in the end, it's just me. And it's for the best that it stay that way.
I don’t have pets, no. But I do know a talking pig!
Well I've given my lunch/breakfast to the pigeons of New York more times than I can think of. They're almost like family at this point.
No pets, I'm afraid. It'd be nice, don't get me wrong, but I'm too busy to have that additional responsibility.
Well I think I know every street, rooftop and subway in New York at this point. But the city always has more secret places hidden away.
If you're willing, I know all the cool spots in and around New York. Places to eat, hang out. The whole shebang!
Swinging around the Big Apple never stops being fun. I imagine that flying around it and seeing everything from above is just as good.
I know a thing or two about whole new worlds. Some universes are more fun than others, but I can definitely talk about some interesting things.
I'm not actually from this place either. I'm from another, another Earth. Traveling across the multiverse definitely has it's fun moments.
Well, uh, nice isn't exactly the word I'd use. Doing what I do puts me in the firing line of people who are the exact opposite of nice.
Nice isn't the word I'd use to describe the life of a vigilante do-gooder, Mia. Unsafe. Dangerous. Life-threatening...those are better words for it.
Oh my gosh, I'm so sorry! Your hair is pretty and special, and you are beautiful. I just didn't mean for that line to sound so weird. (Great first impression, Gwen. Real great.)
Ooh, a death-growl? Sweet. Oh, I-I mean the opposite of sweet, obviously. And hell, that's better than I could ever manage!
The MJ's lead singer doesn't really do it either, our style's more, like, a few energy-building shrieks here and there. Y'know what I mean.
I... suppose this is only fair, given your current... circumstances? Y-yeah, circumstances. That's one word for it.
Hehe... d-don't mind me, providing a little i-inspiration. Or do mind a certain part of me if it, y'know, helps.
Does... umm... this help, by any chance? If I, y'know, stand like this for a bit?
I... err... I hope you don't mind if I stand like this for a bit. I just... umm... thought it might help, s-somehow.
I might as well throw my hat into the ring. Different doesn't mean worse after all.
Hey, so, if anyone prefers the perky, athletic look...
Ahh, Paris by moonlight. So romantic.
Huh. Full Moon tonight. How about that?
Y'know it's hard to tell with these ghosts whether their "oohs!" are just generic, spooky ghost noises... Or whether they're, umm, "appreciating" what's going on over here.
Huh. Full Moon tonight. How about that? None of y'all are werewolves, right?
This is a nudist beach, right? Hope none of us are gonna get in trouble over this.
I guess it's only natural that we all go skinny-dipping after this is over, yeah? Never done it in broad daylight before...or, umm, n-nightlight, either. (I don't think they bought that lie.)
Ugh. Why did we decide to do this here? I'm used to beating up bad guys in dark, grimey alleyways. Not doing this. Again, ugh.
You know, I really think we should've done this somewhere else. I don't want to run into any criminals, and believe me. Alleys are like a hub for criminal activity.
I really hope no one I know walks down here. That'll definitely make the Daily Bugle headlines. Naked Spider Woman takes down criminals!
Hmm. Well, this is healthy at least, isn't it? Standing around naked and doing this here of all places.
Hmm. Oh well, at least standing around butt naked is pretty natural here.
Yeah, yeah, take a picture, jackass! It'll last longer! Oh, umm, sorry. Just didn't like the vibe of that one dude over there. Y'know which one I mean.
$&@#. It's certainly...intense. Standing around in front of a crowd like this.
Do you think we can get some macaroons or crêpes here? I'm quite hungry...
Why do I have the feeling there are rats working in a restaurant nearby?
Paris has a bunch of places to visit and here I am sitting here playing strip poker...(What did you get yourself into, Gwen).
I know I'm normally sticky to surfaces, but is the floor sticky for anyone else, too?
Does anyone know why this place is called the Inventory? Or is it just one of those silly names?
This place seems rather... clean? I guess you have to keep it clean after one of these games...
Can you imagine if someone got a straight of hearts? That would be so fitting given our surroundings.

So, for the curious, I'm still wearing my web-shooters. They're not implants, but they are super small. If you look reeeally caaarefully, you might see them. You might also get webbing in your eyes, though.
Dang, buddy. You're certainly taking no prisoners right now.
Sure would be nice for someone else to lose some some clothes right about now... maybe someone who has a generous amount to give?
Least you're doing alright right now, dude.
It's nice to get away from things, play a silly game like this. Doing what I do you certainly make your fair share of enemies. Any of you guys have interesting enemies, villains worth talking about?

Y'know what's good about a place like this? It gets me away from things. Dealing with supervillains every day is certainly stressful. I'm sure you guys have some interesting stories to tell, any enemies worth mentioning?
Of course, I don't just do Spider-Woman stuff. Not sure if I mentioned it already, but I'm part of a band. I play drums. It's great! Anyone here musical? Or want to be?
Say, who here likes music? I know I do! I like it enough that I started a band with my besties. If anyone wants to talk music, then I'm all ears.

Man I wish we had a playlist set up or something. Way harder to have a good time without some good music going on. Even better live. Been too long since I last went to a gig, least one that I wasn't on stage for.
So, umm, some of us are gonna have to reveal more than others. Anyone else have any cool alter-egos or personas?
Hey, so, I doubt any personal info is gonna get shared outside our little group, anyone got any cool personas or alter egos? That's always a good way for people like me to get to know each-other.
You better have nothing "butt" respect for me! I don't normally do this sorta thing.
Well, now I know I've hit rock bottom. (Ah man. Even joking about this I still feel pretty awkward.)
Hope, umm, you don't mind if I "butt" in.
I know you're looking. I can't say I mind too much, it's the whole point of the game, right? Just... don't be creepy about it.
So, umm, where's all of our stuff being kept right now? I don't wanna leave anything behind once this is over.
I try to keep in good shape. It... umm... it is a good shape, right?

Hey, so, I know I come off as kinda punkish, but I don't just like punk stuff. I like all kinds of music. Some friends of mine have been sharing their tastes. For instance, R&B, Jazz, even some J-Pop. See? Don't just a book by her colors.
Y'know a lot of people just assume that I must only like punk stuff. That just ain't true. Take the music I'm into. I listen to some R&B, some Blues, there's even a few Japanese groups I follow.
Having a rounded power-set sure is useful. Definitely times I wouldn't have made it without having one ability or another.
In a few of the universes I’ve traveled to, people have tried to do stuff like register superheroes….

That's a me! Spider-Woman, in the flesh! Speaking of flesh, play your cards right, and you might either see a little or a lot. Can't say I'd mind seeing a little more of you... s-so long as you don't mind.
Spider-Woman, Ghost-Spider, whatever you wanna call me! I've gotta few of 'em. A pleasure to make your acquaintance. May the best super cute super-heroine win!
Umm... y'know what? I'm not exactly sure how it works either. All I know is that I've got it, my powers help me look out for folk, and I'm super awesome because of it all, haha.
Y'know, Jan? I've never one hundred percent figured it out myself. All I know is that I like rock music and that my powers are awesome.
Huh? You sure? I was under the impression that we're more popular than ever, Jan! Can't go a single universe without seeing good movies, merch and music that's superhero related.
Aww, come on. We're pretty popular right now if you ask me. Besides, have you seen the box office numbers for superhero movies? We're setting records right now, girl!
Really hurting for views there, aren’tcha, Nicole?
Well, who doesn’t like the funny papers? Fans of me in your audience?
It’s… uh, shoot. Well, it’s more like there’s, just a lot of me's out there. Some less lucky than others, unfortunately.
Oh no, we are so not doing this.
Well, I’m the drummer, so at least I’m cooler than our bassist.
Oh, that a-hole? 'Scuse my french, but really. He is an a-hole.
No, nooo, and noooooo. I wish! I don’t even have insurance!
I’ve gotten a good grip on them, but at first, yeah. I know a guy who ripped out a big chunk of my hair when he got his…
Everyone needs to unwind, y’know? But what does or doesn't go on between me and others isn't for you to know. Sorry.
Oh? That? Yeah. That’s just a joke. Don't ask, but Deadpool gave me a few pointers about how that works.
I’m just about the only Gwen Stacy that's still adding chapters to her story. And, well, people try to use me to fit some agenda or another. I've met some cool people. Others, not so cool.
I... you... waitwaitwait, this isn't a fetish thing or anything like that. This getup is to protect my identity, lady. Pretty useful in the crime-fghting business.
Oh, umm...n-no, honey, you've got it all wrong. The mask's so people don't know who I am whenever I'm dealing with criminals and super-villains.
Oh, well, I started off on my own. And I still mostly work on my own, but I've worked with all kinds of people since then.
You might be surprised. I've teamed up with all kinds of people. But I still work solo more often than not.
Whaaa? Nah, I'm just your regular ol' crime-fighting Spider, girl! I-I mean, Spider-Woman. Just to avoid confusion. It would be pretty sick if I was Spanish, though. Can't lie.
Nope. This masked hero makes a livin' fighting bad guys and rescuing folk from burning buildings. Though I also speak a little Spanish... umm... Encantada... d-de conocerte? Did I get that right?
I'm not shy, Kyou, I'm modest. Like, obviously my suit shows off what I've got. But it's not like I'm, umm, indecent about it.
Modesty is a virtue, Kyou. I might be a little awkwierd at times, but I'm not ashamed of how I look. As if, y'know, dressing in skin-tight spandex didn't make it obvious.
Nice to meet you to, Heris! What field or research are you in, by the way? I overheard you talking something science related earlier, but I didn't quite catch "what precisely".
A pleasure all the same, Heris! Say, umm, I'm something of a scientist myself. I'd love to hear about the sort of research you do, so long as you don't mind talking about work right now.
Well, The Spider-Woman where I’m from. The Notorious Spider-Woman in the Bugle and on my mix-tape.
Yup! The Spider-Woman, also known as the Ghost-Spider in some towns. I'm NYC's resident wall-crawling hero!
Kind of? I...grew up with him, with Peter. But he uh, didn't become Spider-Man in my time-line.
Oh! No. Though I definitely know of a few Spider-Men. Which one are you asking about? (It's probably Peter, but it doesn't hurt to ask).
I mean, I wasn't really expecting to win that one.
Yeah... that was to be expected. Still a big oof though.
Hmph. Oh Well.
*sigh* Guess that was to be expected.
Wasn't exactly betting my life on that last hand. Hehe.
I could've won with that hand. I've had less likely wins than that before. Honest.
Hey now. You trying to tell me that my pair ain't good enough? I've got a perfectly nice pair of feet, I'll have ya know.
That certainly went pair. Shaped I mean.
Sheesh. Looks like I'm gonna have to try a little harder, aren't I?
Oh! I thought... well dang. I'll have to up my game.
...Well. $#!£. That's nothing but a straight disappointment right there.
Wait, wha? Ugh. I had a straight and I still... that's just disgusting.
Wow. You guys are kinda hardcore, huh?
Ohhhh-kaaaay. Guess I'm losing on two pairs now.
Aww. Me again? Well, shoot.
I thought three was a lucky number?
Damn it! Really?!
I thought I had that one in the bag.
...Flush out of luck, huh?
How the heck did... well, damn. Fair play.
(House full of $#!% right there). Oh, umm, s-sorry. Well done. You got me fair and square.
...A-alright. I-I guess I just lost that one.
Well, Marinette, you showed me yours, so I guess it's only fair I do the same.
Sure am! Queens represent!
You know, Sayla, thanks for amending the rulebook. It's great to know full-body stuff can count as two pieces!
Huh? We’re speaking English, aren’t we, Uravity?
What? We're speaking English. Or is there some kinda translation magic going on here?
Well, okay, story-time. Once upon a time, a certain vigilante-rockstar-superhero lost her powers.
Alright, Alright, fair enough. Now, wanna see me take my hood off?
Hmm...I can just lower the hood, right?
Okay, well, my first thought was to lose my shoes. But they're attached to my costume, and it isn't easy to fix. So, I've got another trick to play...
You got me, huh? Well, I'm afraid you're not gonna get much of a reward for it.
You got me? Not to worry, I have a plan for this situation.
Well, I'm ahead of the rest of you. So I've not anything to worry about.
I'm in luck! I'm in the lead, and I'm still wearing my mask. This is going to plan so far.
Well, looks like various other blackmail-able material from blackmail-able folks is out, so...I guess I can...
Look, this mask is more than just a cover. It's like a badge. It lets me do what I need to get done.
Damn. I'm winning, but, at what cost?
Oh. Was starting to think that I'd be able to keep from doing this next bit.
Oh. Oooh...this was the part I was doing my best to avoid.
Bugger. At least, if I was British, that's probably what I'd say in this situation.
...Shoot. Well, least I'm out of my own universe, so I can probably get away with this. Otherwise I'd be outta here.
Have the rest of you considered playing less risky? You're kinda sucking at this.
Sure, I may have given the game away about my secret identity, but I'm gonna take the win in this game right here!
Well? Oh well. I should be keeping my modesty at least if not my mask. Yeah, I'm keeping optimistic here.
Well, I was expecting to lose a little more...
Hehee, my turn again is it? Well, this should be a little more fun than the last time.
Eyyy. Ya got me! Fair play.
Oh. My turn? Alright, no problemo.
You guys want to hear a stupid fact?
Okay, okay, fine, you can have the rest of the suit too.
Oh. Well, okay. Bikini level next, I guess. No problem for me. (Just gotta pretend I'm wearing that instead of my underwear).
Aah. Oh well, had to happen eventually.
Well, it was likely to happen eventually. So no worries.
I'm still hanging in here. I'm kinda good at that after all.
You got me! Haha.
I've kept you hanging by a web for long enough, I guess...
Wait, it can't be me! I'll have to...Oh. well, I'm definitely not the first to do this...sorry, guess I shouldn't complain.
Oh great. Finally that time.
Well...that's a heck of an oops right there.
...Oops.
Okay, okay. Just...give me a sec to get ready.
Oh...alright, I know I'm winning, but that doesn't make doing this easier. Gimme a moment.
...Oops. Again.
Okay. I'd say here goes the last of my modesty. But I could lose again after this and, well...yeah. That.
Man. I up my game, so does the opposition. Don't know whether to be mad or impressed. (Madpressed?)
Things are rarely easy, huh?
And there goes my lead. Aww.
Aww. I guess you can only fight the odds for so long.
Shoot.
Hey, so, I’m about to show you the goods, mind following up? Uh, for the sake of the international hero community.
Well, Marinette, you showed me yours, so I guess I’ll show you, and everyone else mine.
Sure am! Queens represent!
You know, Sayla, thanks for amending the rulebook. It's great to know full-body stuff can count as two pieces!
Huh? We’re speaking English, aren’t we, Uravity?
